divs: Sighting Detailsmy wife & i were on our patio having a smoke and we noticed a steady white light moving from east to west at a 2:00 angle. we thought it was strange because normally the lights we see have 2or3 different colors (usually red or blue & white) but this thing in the sky had only 1 white light and it was nonblinking then when it reached our view of north it dissappeared.
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Gresham
There were no other sightings in Gresham on or around September 15th 2008
